definitions.definition: The quality or state of being popular; especially, the state of being esteemed by, or of being in favor with, the people at large
definitions.example: Politicians are rarely known for their popularity.

definitions.definition: The quality or state of being adapted or pleasing to common, poor, or vulgar people; hence, cheapness; inferiority; vulgarity.
Something which obtains, or is intended to obtain, the favor of the vulgar; claptrap.
The act of courting the favour of the people.
